alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 7:58PM MST until January 21 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...A mix of rain, freezing rain and wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch, mainly over the higher hills. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Montana. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Freezing rain will produce a glaze of ice on roads and sidewalks. Areas of poor visibility in snow are also expected. Please stay alert for changing road conditions this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest potential for freezing rain is in the lower valleys, including along I-94 through Hysham, Forsyth and Miles City.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
